channel.title: Nora's Hideout
channel.description: Nora's personal website for programming and other stuff.

item.title: Rendering Skybox Panoramas With POV-Ray
item.description: A knowledge article on rendering POV-Ray scenes into several files that can be turned into a panorama.

item.title: Writing a Windows Screensaver
item.description: A knowledge article on writing native Win32 screensavers.

item.title: Using modern toolchains for Windows 95!
item.description: An article on how I got the Windows 11 SDK to output software for Windows 95.

item.title: Verifying my website on Discord
item.description: A short story and guide on how to verify GitHub Pages sites with Discord.

item.title: Discord Website Embeds
item.description: A knowledge base article on how Discord rich embeds work.

item.title: Getting UWP unit tests to work was a pain.
item.description: A story on how getting GitHub Actions to run UWP unit tests was a pain in the ass.

item.title: The second redesign has arrived!
item.description: Sorry for the even bigger delay, I was busy with other projects!

item.title: Added RSS Feeds and Social Media!
item.description: Now you can follow the blog (and my social media) without manually checking the website!

item.title: Added GitHub Discussions And A Favicon!
item.description: Added GitHub Discussions to act as a comment section. Also added an icon that displays in the tab header of your browser.

item.title: Happy New Year 2022!
item.description: I hope you have a great year!

item.title: Raising bugchecks from userspace in NT.
item.description: Why did Microsoft decide to allow ANY userspace program without admin rights to bugcheck the system with 2 function calls?

item.title: The First Post!
item.description: The first ever blog post for my new website!
